comic.list: function Main(html){var chapterImages,chapterPath;eval(strmiddle(html,'<script>;','</script>').replace('var',''););log(chapterImages);var str_decrypt = CryptoJS['AES']['decrypt'](chapterImages,CryptoJS['enc']['Utf8']['parse']('1231994MHB123456'), {'iv': CryptoJS['enc']['Utf8']['parse']('ABCDEF1G34123412'),'mode': CryptoJS['mode']['CBC'],'padding': CryptoJS['pad']['Pkcs7']});var string1 = str_decrypt['toString'](CryptoJS['enc']['Utf8']);log(string1['toString']());eval('chapterImages = '+string1['toString']()+';');var arr = [];for (var i = 0 ; i<chapterImages.length; i++){arr.push('https://img01.eshanyao.com/'+chapterPath+chapterImages[i]);}return arr;};
